attributes.action: re-nationise all public services so that the emphasis is on service rather than on profit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many public services - electricity, gas, water, Royal Mail, British Telecom, transport (particularly rail) which are severly compromised because the emphasis in on profit rather than service. Shareholders have to come first before investment in service and directors get huge salaries and bonuses despite poor service.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
